name: Authorization Letter To Collect Documents
description: This particular authorization letter to collect documents sample for claiming would assist an individual to form an authorization letter for the purpose of claiming important documents on their behalf for properties.
content:
• From:
  • ${name}
  • ${address}
  • ${contactInformation}
  • To:
  • ${recipientName}
  • ${recipientAddress}
Dear ${recipientName}
I ${name}, herby grant ${representative} permission to act as my representative to collect following documents ${documentName} in my behalf. In order to expedite the identification verification process ${representative} will identify himself/herself with ${representativeIdentificationDocument} with number ${representativeIdentificationDocumentNumber}.
Sincerely
.......................................
